rows.label: qev030906_MSG0001
rows.name:
At wedding, Auld Belgazus patted me on head.
Said he left Nemard in my care. His hand was
wrinkled, but so big. So strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030906_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am glad Auld met his end without pain or distress.
Seeing Nemard wed must have been great relief.[ST:wait ]
